unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhaka mhojea college disanchem ugddas yeta! Tea vellar, sogllech apnnak roll numberak lagun kitle traslean asle (koxe, rollno. 123456789, kiteak tori lottery ticketachem vorin!). Ani mhaka placement registration ID vixim bolunk dinaka - regID_BITS_2020 ugddas dovrunk podtalo kiteak tori naukri mellonk chance mellonk. Atam mhaka fakt mhojem PAN ani Aadhaar ugddas dovrunk zai. Jivit ek vinod mhunnchonam?
normalised: Arre yaar, mhaka mhojea kolejiche dis ugddas aile! Tea vellar, sogllech aplea roll numberak lagun kitle stress ghetale (koxe, roll number ekxim vees kotti charuchallis lakh ponchpanas hazar saatxim choryanshi, kiteak tor to ek lottery ticket asat mhunn!). Ani placement registration I-D vixim mhaka kitech uloinasat - reg I-D underscore B-I-T-S underscore don hazar ani vees ugddas dovrunk podtalo, toruch nokri mellpachi chance asli. Atam mhaka fokot mhozo P-A-N ani Aadhaar ugddas dovrunk zai. Jivit ek jock, nhoi mhunn?
text: Arre yaar, mhaka mhojea college disanchem ugddas yeta! Tea vellar, sogllech apnnak roll numberak lagun kitle traslean asle (koxe, rollno. 123456789, kiteak tori lottery ticketachem vorin!). Ani mhaka placement registration ID vixim bolunk dinaka - regID_BITS_2020 ugddas dovrunk podtalo kiteak tori naukri mellonk chance mellonk. Atam mhaka fakt mhojem PAN ani Aadhaar ugddas dovrunk zai. Jivit ek vinod mhunnchonam?
